134.heading: Lingering Death.
134.title: "Demon of the Lingering Death"
134.author: [No author]
notes: Sundays Oct. 10, 1954 to Feb. 6, 1955.

SUMMARY: While Flame recovers in the lamasery in Tibet or Nepal, Johnny discovers that one of the monks is the villain Orchid, who has been searching for a legendary statue made of radium. Orchid forces Johnny to fly him and the statue out of the mountains. I. Johnny Hazard. k. Lingering Death. k. Death. k. Lamaseries. k. Monks. k. Tibet. k. Nepal. k. Orchid. k. Statues. k. Radium. Call no.: PN6728f.J64A2 1980
